May 22, 2021
How to add a new release.
I had to use the Large File System due to the size of releaser

Procedure:
0.Make sure a copy of the zipped distro is in the \dist folder
1.Open a git bash to the folder ~\pylen_git\dist
2.>git add <filename><enter>
3.>git commit -m "comment about what is being added"
4.>git push origin master

It might take a minute or two to push the new release up to the git.
